website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundLink Bluetooth On-Ear is pricey, but it's also one of the best -- if not the best -- on-ear wireless headphones to date.
pros: The Bose SoundLink Bluetooth On-Ear is compact, comfortable and sounds excellent for a Bluetooth headphone
It also works well as a headset for phone calls, its buttons are easy to operate by feel, and battery life is good at 15 hours
cons: It's somewhat expensive and the sound in wired mode isn't great

website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundLink On-Ear Bluetooth Headphones deliver a high-quality audio experience in a comfortable design, but they have plenty of competition in this price tier.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass response and well-defined highs
Simple control panel layout makes for easy operation
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Sculpted sound signature not for purists

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: It will easily fall from your head if you bend over.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Redz

customer_reviews.title: Limited Life
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine until the ear cushion came apart. The replacement from Bose is IMPOSSIBLE to fit to the headphone. So you end up with a headphone that cannot be worn. Bose was absolutely no assistance. You cannot mail the earphones in to be repaired, and their only solution was for me to drive two hours from where I live to a Bose store, where someone "might" be able to assist. Do not waste your money. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: looks cool at first
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad product, but after 6 months the ear pads have lost their cushioning and are flat and hard. It does get several hours of use each day, but I did expect better durability from such a respected brand. The cable also stopped working after only occasional use, which isn't a huge deal because it is primarily used with BT, but speaking of that, the volume is fairly limited while on BT - a common problem with BT headphones in general, I suspect limited purposefully to extend battery life, but I'd like to crank it if I want to!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Biron III

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the headphones were great, quality & sound - until the earpads ripped off. My opinion on the quality quickly changed. I ordered replacement pads - which are nearly impossible to install. I've had the pads for a few months now, and my quick frustration hasn't allowed me to get them replaced (I've tried several times, but could only handle about 10 minutes). I'm a long time Bose user, but they have lost me. These will probably end up in the trash and replaced with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Cox Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: In love. I bought this item about a week ago, I charged it once until 100% and a week later 60%. Great battery life. Perfect fit, not big at all and not too small. As for the cushions, comfortable. And of course they will wear out after a year, after constant use and mostly sweat, it’s bound to happen, good thing replacement is affordable and easy to replace(haven’t done so yet, since they are new, but I did do some research before buying). Overall, if you need some comfy headphones. I recommend these over beats. Oh and sound is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: ricardo mercado

customer_reviews.title: I Expect Better from Bose
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for almost 2 years, relying on them daily for work, on both a phone and a computer. The bluetooth connectivity/audio quality often degrades, usually mid-call, when connected to a new Macbook Air. Has constant problems when connected to two devices, often disconnecting from my phone (and announcing it) while I'm on computer audio, leaving a gap in communication. Updating the firmware and erasing the connection sometimes helps for a few days, but it always degrades again. I'm hoping that mine are just a dud, but I certainly expect more from a $200+ pair of BT headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Morse

customer_reviews.title: for a superior product. I chose the on ear set because ...
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is one of the nicest things I have done for myself. I use head phones so I don't disturb my apartment neighbors and these set me free from the headphone cord. Thanks, Bose, for a superior product. I chose the on ear set because I wear glasses and find the over ear headphone end up hurting because of the pressure on the glasses stems.
customer_reviews.author: lotteb

customer_reviews.title: Love them, just wish the case was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Bose in the past, my boyfriend recently bought be the Bose Sound True Ultra In ear headphones and like most people I had issues with the wires bunching up before they begin to crack open. He recently told me to order what headphones I would like and be happy with and I chose these because they are bluetooth and I can used an Audio cable if I want to, plus I like on ear headphones more than Over or around ear headphones. I haven't tested the bluetooth feature yet, but I love them. My only complaint would be that I wish the case that you get was a little more roomier
customer_reviews.author: Alyss Shiles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and battery life
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and the sound is great. I was concerned about the ease of pairing, but really it couldn't be simpler. It immediately found my ipad and iphone and stays connected at a distance. When they're folded up and in the storage case, they're a little thicker than I'd like (softball sized, larger than an orange) but I can pack around them. The sound quality is really great. I also watched a full season of an Amazon Prime series and the battery was still at 100%. Great headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth, Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Well worth every penny. I waited a while to review and have had nothing but great music. Plus you don’t have those obnoxious ones that cover your ears completely. I did not time the battery charge but goes a whole day and it only takes an hour at the most to recharge. If you’re interested, don’t think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for frequent travelers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband (I already have a pair), and he was skeptical because they are not officially "noise cancelling". But he finally tried them on a recent trip and was happily surprised. My experience with them has also been fantastic... I own an older and larger pair of Bose that are noise cancelling, and these actually work better in terms of screening out background noise. Plus they are smaller and easier to travel with. Love Bose quality and sound!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Ear pad cushions not built to last!
customer_reviews.text: I know I rated this headphone very high soon after purchasing it, but after only 2 1/2 years of use, the pads started to peel off. In fact, the left ear pad just fell off! What a bummer! For a top notch brand, why would Bose even come up with poor quality for its ear pads? And I used to loved this headphones until the pads started cracking and peeling off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Louie A

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the second pair I have bought. My wife listened to them and immediately wanted a pair. Excellent sound, not bad noise cancellation, light, and are just perfect when using a tablet. If my wife and I are looking at different things which need audio, we just slip them on and the other party isn't bothered.
customer_reviews.author: nicknut1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality - Left earphone stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of the product. THe left earphone stopped working and Bose's response was a replacement headphone 20% off. Thank you Bose for losing a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: More versatile and higher quality than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly to use them as a hands-free iPhone headset. They work perfectly for that. No one has ever complained that the can't hear me and I can hear them perfectly. But in addition to that, I'm using this in so many ways-it's indispensable to me now.I use it to workout in the gym. I use it when hanging out on my deck while reading and sunning. I jog with it. I use it when on my riding mower. It syncs with my iPhone, with my iPad, and with my Panasonic Bluetooth phone. It'll connect to whichever of those devices happens to be on. And the battery life is spectacular. A truly great product!
customer_reviews.author: Condado Beach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. Bought as a present for wife to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Bought as a present for wife to remplace Dr Dre beats and the quality is just much superior as well as sound quality as expected from BOSE!!!
customer_reviews.author: JaVi

customer_reviews.title: Headphones were wonderful 47 years ago but now they just rock.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Bose SoundLink's in the past 6 months I bought one a few months back and now I'm buying one pair for a friend for Christmas. In 1968 I bought my first pair of Sennheiser headphones. The headphones were wonderful but that was 47 years ago. All the issues that I once had wearing them, fit, feel and sound have gone now. If you put on these Bose "on ear" headphones you can wear them all day and the sound is about 47 years in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Fricassee

customer_reviews.title: Great On-Ear headphones by Bose at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon over a year ago. Use most every day,no degradation in sound quality, headset, or Bluetooth functions. I blew a lot of money on headsets before coming across these.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Laramie

customer_reviews.title: The very best Bluetooth Headphones so far!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Wow! I have tried many bluetooth headphones and these have to be the best. Great sound (as good as the QC25's) and I can make it to every corner of my house with a connected iPhone at the center of the house. It is also great with the voice prompts and with a flick of the switch I'm able to switch to any of my many connected IOS devices. If you purchase a set, be sure to go to the Bose website and update the software. Very soft cushions and I can wear these for several hours without fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: edh667

customer_reviews.title: Search no longer.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many headphones and these are hands down the best ones. I have ran across way to bulky, heavy, not the best sounding one. My main use if for the gym. These are so small and light that I actually enjoy wearing them. I can barely tell I am wearing them. I had tried on the beats solo and really loved them but couldn't spend 300 on them! These are even better than them. Sound quality is great and they are much lighter than the beats.
customer_reviews.author: caritam2002

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing! I can't believe how long the batteries last
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing! I can't believe how long the batteries last, I using it for work and get my phone calls, skype and play music all the time. I can walk around the house which is a big 3,000 house and I hear as clear as I am by the devices connected too. Compared to the Beats wireless this is 150% better and less expensive. I am super happy with my new headphones. The only issue is that my iMac keep getting disconnected but so does my bluetooth mouth and keyboard so I am think is a computer issue and not a headphone problem, the other devices, BookPro and Iphone 6 work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: juan luque

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, can wear for hours on end with no issues, pairs well with all devices so far. Sound is really solid and controls are good as well as battery life and comes with a really nice travel case. Why not 5 stars, because I would like them to be a little louder and just a little more bass to them and the quirky plug in cord being different size. I'd give them 4.5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z...

customer_reviews.title: We couldn't be happier with our selection
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these Bose headphones for Christmas presents for each other. We couldn't be happier with our selection. I was reluctant to give up my earbuds as I thought over the ear headphones would be too clumsy. But I was pleasantly surprised to see how compact and light these are. The sound quality is absolutely amazing but who would expect any less from Bose. I'm so glad my husband talked me into a bluetooth set. I love not being tethered to my device. So if you are looking for a lightweight, wireless, amazing sound quality headset, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I Love Mine
customer_reviews.text: Compact, comfortable and sounds absolutely great for a Bluetooth headphone. It also works well as a headset for phone calls, its buttons are easy to operate by feel, and battery life is really good. I've gotten hours of playing music and also binge watch a whole season of house of cards with about 40% battery left. It's somewhat expensive and the sound in wired mode isn't great. It might be a little pricey, but it's also one of the best -- if not the best -- on-ear wireless(bluetooth) headphones to date in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a birthday gift for my boyfriend a few years ago and he still loves them. Uses them frequently for his daily commute on public transit and they do a great job of blocking out unwanted sound with good sound quality itself. He’s a big music fan who always complains about using bad quality speakers, but he likes these. Battery still lasts several days.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pairs easily with my iPhone and Macbook
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Comfy pads and fits well on my small head. Pairs easily with my iPhone and Macbook. Great for commuting to work and using at my desk. Cons: Sometimes audio is out of sync when using with macbook (unpairing and pairing usually fixes, but annoying) Pro/Con: It can be paired with two devices but sometimes hard to switch if I am using them with my computer and get a phone call if I answer with the headphones on it won't switch the audio automatically. Had some confusion but manually can solve by turning bluetooth off for device not using.
customer_reviews.author: medium cool

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about my Bose Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my Bose Wireless Headphones. I think what I love the most about them is the sound quality. I use them when I watch movies on my I-Pad and the sound is great and they fit comfortable over my ears. I definitely made the right choice when I chose these Wireless Headphones.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The description was very deceiving ! Nowhere in it did it say that this item was used. So I was very surprised when I received the item and found out it was used !
customer_reviews.author: Brendan C. Cochenour

customer_reviews.title: The only issue I've had is that my ears get warm and feel a little more sensitive with long extended periods of use like around
customer_reviews.text: A solid product. Some people complain about head headphones breaking or ripping apart but they obviously do not take care of them. I've used mine for work and the gym and have never had an issue. The only issue I've had is that my ears get warm and feel a little more sensitive with long extended periods of use like around the 3 hour mark. Regardless these are the best Bluetooth headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, deep base and clean - paired with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, deep base and clean - paired with my Samsung S6 and light enough to work out with. Pairs easily with devices and talking on the phone is easy. Folds up nicely to fit in my backpack pouch. Ears get sweaty sometimes and I wish the ear pads were made of a breathable material- my only con. Use most everyday for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Yukahey

customer_reviews.title: Feel Like A Cloud
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife who is VERY picky when it comes to headphones and how they feel. After trying on over 2 dozen headphones at several stores she says the Bose felt like a cloud touching her ears. They were easy to pair with our Samsung Smart TV and now no more cords to trip over. A little pricey but worth it, considering the quality IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: RoadiJeff

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. The only knock I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift. Great sound. The only knock I have is that I wear glasses so after hours of wearing the headset, it can irritate around the glass ear loop.
customer_reviews.author: ScrapBin617

customer_reviews.title: I had a Sony MDR-ZX750BN headset which fortunately drowned after slipping off my ear and into my ...
customer_reviews.text: This Bose headset is a heavenly product. I had a Sony MDR-ZX750BN headset which fortunately drowned after slipping off my ear and into my bathtub while I was relaxing. I say fortunately because I could not hear in my Sony headphone while my bathtub was running. I decided to replace my Sony with the real deal Bose. Even though it cost more I was happy to say that Bose passed the bathtub test. I can hear clearly even while my bathtub is running. Since purchasing Bose I am back on my treadmill on my workout routine. My music sounds so great that I'm pumped up to work out again. Thanks Bose for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. I used beats wireless headphones and just ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. I used beats wireless headphones and just got the Bose and I just want to say BOSE IS THE BOSS in headphones and music clarity. Best one I ever heard. Very easy set up just turn on the power and connect to your phone or tablet. Great battery life and I used for 4 hours straight and I didn't feel anything on my ears. For beats after an hour it hurt my ears. I love this product and strongly recommend if someone is looking for wireless headphones. You will get the price worth trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Ramenani

customer_reviews.title: What was I thinking
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without these for so long. I have been watching these headphones for about a year before finally pulling the trigger. Sound is amazing, works seamlessly, easy connection, connects to more than one device and smart enough to toggle between what is in range. Although you can choose which to connect to as well. Sound is clear to the caller, no one could even tell I was on a headphone. Love Love. I take it everywhere! No battery, no problem it comes with headphone jack, allowing you to use it the old school way.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Brooks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the sound over Bluetooth is amazing. It is clear and crisp. I tried the phone call function and it worked flawlessly. Yes, it really does work in very loud or windy situations. I have a Bose sound system in my vehicle and I would not settle for any other headphones. I compared these to many other brands and models but the Bose SoundLink was the clear winner. The look awesome. They fit well. So easy to adjust. The only downside is that I have pinched my fingers unfolding them. Still love these!
customer_reviews.author: 💚TosaTat💚Top Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and comfort. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these compare to similar headphones, but, wow, am I surprised by just how much I love these headphones. I bought them to rock out to music in my office without driving other people crazy. They sync with my iMac in seconds, and the sound is amazing. A huge plus - they are incredibly light and comfortable on my big round noggin. I used to have wired headphones - never again. The freedom of not having a wire to snag is surprisingly awesome.
customer_reviews.author: 843charlie

customer_reviews.title: Bose Nailed it with these wireless Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. So comfortable..I have worn them for hours with no discomfort. Very lightweight, soft leather on the ears and compact....and Pairing is so easy. I like the way the headphone talk to you letting you know which device it's pairing to.... So cool! The sound and quality is incredible! Crystal clear natural sound and NOT overpowering bass like some of the other popular headphones. It also comes with a cool storage case. It fits right in my pocketbook with ease. Love these headphones! Bose is the absolute best in audio technology! They did an excellent job with these wireless headphones! Don't hesitate to get these.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones that have held up through extensive use
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones that have held up through extensive use. I've never had any major issues getting the bluetooth to work, and the sound quality is much better than most in-ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Leith

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Pairing couldn't be easier with voice prompting. I gave these to my daughter as a Christmas gift. The sound is what I would have expected. She's using these with her phone and computer and has walked all over the house while talking on her phone without disruption. They condense down nicely into the supplied carrying case. This is what I expect from a Bose product and we weren't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lund

customer_reviews.title: This solved the problem and I love these. Always loved Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have the corded version of these headphones but being only 4'10" in my old age (LOL) I'm always tripping on the cord. This solved the problem and I love these. Always loved Bose headphones, even tho most teens copy their idols and use Beats (I've heard they have a breakage problem) I don't listen to hiphop or rock and Bose always have a nice clean true sound reproduction. They also stay on my head pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, when they work.
customer_reviews.text: Right side died less than a year after purchase. Awesome sound while they lasted. Don't recommend purchasing though. $199 is a lot for a set of headphones that don't last a year.
customer_reviews.author: CEuC

customer_reviews.title: old QC3's) these are amazing! They don't have the active noise cancelling of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my old QC3's. After much comparison (Parrot Ziks, Beats, old QC3's) these are amazing! They don't have the active noise cancelling of the old QC3's but they sound much better and are far cheaper than the QC3's were originally. The bluetooth features are great, the battery lasts a very, very long time. I love these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: JDCalVino

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, not too comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great but for some reason after wearing them my ears start hurting, so I can only wear them for a few minutes. I ordered these in white color, they're really nice but if you're thinking about working out with these you better a order darker color, if you're not careful you'll get these dirty right away. Not for running that's for sure. It's really convenient that you can answer calls and talk while using these. Nice headphones but I only wish the pads on these were more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DFrance

customer_reviews.title: but he fell in love with this smaller unit when he tried out my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's Day gift to my husband. We have several Bose products and of course, he simply loves this headphone. He already had the over the ear, but he fell in love with this smaller unit when he tried out my son's model. Like the over the ear, this on ear headphone sports a perfect and comfortable fit and the sound is clear and crisp, as all Bose products are. Thanks, Bose, you have another satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound without wires
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the sound, and the freedom from wires. No problem pairing with iPod Nano, iPhone 4, and iPad Air. These aren't noise canceling but they do a nice job of blocking the noise around the house or yard. Haven't used them on a plane yet, but I'm confident they'd be a major step up from the earbuds I've used in the past. They fold up nice and the travel case is great for traveling. Extremely satisfied. We'll see if they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: DanD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My mom absolutely loves these. She has poor cell reception in her house so this lets her leave her phone by the window and walk around her house while she talks. She constantly says “I’m talking to you on my BOSE headphones”
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are really comfortable. I share them with my wife and it's still comfortable with big and little heads!! I love that the Bluetooth is clear and can hold multiple profiles. Connection to iPhone / iPad is seamless. Connection to laptop via Bluetooth is fantastic for Cisco IP Phone use because the mic is so good. Charging is quick via USB and I love that you can connect with a wire which is especially useful when flying.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James Fleming

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The only think that surprised me is it seems like I'll get a really short skip every now and then. Still they sound fantastic, are comfortable enough for me to wear at work for hours, easy to pull off when I get an incoming call and need to switch to my work headset. Love the little case as I take them back and forth to work in my purse since I don't want them to get stolen. Was worth the 250 bucks to be wireless and have great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.author: K. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy Bluetooth, low volume
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. The Bluetooth was glitchy - every once in a while the music would drop out then come back in. Also they did not get loud enough for me. They look nicely made, and noise reduction worked pretty good but I didn't like the functionality. I'll stick with their wired headphones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wiechman

customer_reviews.title: I just have to say that this headphones are super comfortable. My last premium pair would not work ...
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say that this headphones are super comfortable. My last premium pair would not work when you were 10 feet away. This one has not had one little issue as I walk around my house talking on the phone or listing to music. I do however wish it has a much sexer look to it. But the quality of sound is great,
customer_reviews.author: gina kesh

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2014
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing (for wireless, on ear headphones). Best Bluetooth quality I have found and comfy enough for those long plane rides. The battery life is awesome and if they do happen to die you can always plug them in to your phone. I like the freedom from the cord, makes it easy to stow my phone in an place that it will actually stay in. They also get decent range. I can take my dog into the yard and keep a connection, but the more walls, the shorter the travel distance.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Zwick

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headset!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nephew for Christmas and he went nuts as this was the one he wanted. They are very high quality and very sharp and clear to listen with. We are very very happy with this and so glad we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Great phones.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bose sound. Have headphones from years ago still attached to my keyboard and taped together. These are beautiful in the ivory blue, have a super nice case, and a cord for when the battery is dead. The only complaint is the charging cord is very short and black. Ice. They are so comfy, even the headband is padded with foam. The IOS has an equalizer that works with them. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikalette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these however wish they made a more breathable ear cover. They get stinky
customer_reviews.author: Tom Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Soundlinks have great sound, I particularly like how light they are because I'm petite. All of the features are easy to figure out, pairing for example is a breeze. I have had other Bluetooth headphones and these ones surpass them on every category, specially in quality of sound, which is why you want them! I use them at work and wear them for hours at a time without any discomfort. The carrying case is also great, I look forward to taking them on my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Pepa

customer_reviews.title: lov 'em
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound, they aren't heavy, they fold nicely, and hold a charge for moderate use for 5 days. I like that it can remember up to something like 6 devices and concurrent connection to two devices so I can be listening to my MacBook Air and take a call on my iPhone. The seem like they will hold up a while. People don't complain about the quality when o make calls. Wish they had a hard carry case, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These have amazing sound. My husband loves them and uses them while doing yard work. They are very sturdy and comfortable. The battery lasts a long time. I can get about 10' away and still have signal. I have a hearing aid and they don't interfere with it, no feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine M

customer_reviews.title: sound awesome and battery last for long time
customer_reviews.text: sound awesome and battery last for long time, bought this for my son and he has bought a few of other wireless headphone, this is by far the best according to him.
customer_reviews.author: hansmadar

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, cute color, and great features and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these! I love Bose, and I love the color of the headphones, rather than the usual black color. I tried them out as soon as I received them, and I am not disappointed. They connected quick and easily to my devices, and the sound is incredible. They come with a cute carry case, and I cannot wait to use these on a trip. I can see myself using these often. They are lightweight, and just so cute! A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kibbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and battery life on these headphones are phenomenal. The build quality is fantastic and feels premium to the touch. Everything has sturdy build and doesn't feel "cheap" or "plasticky" to the touch. I was worried the cloth headband would feel cheap but the fabric there also feels good to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best head phones I have ever owned. Turn them on and they connect quickly. Push the power up again, it gives you the battery charge %. Intuitive to use, awesome sound. Great mid-level head phones. Unless you have to have noise cancelling, these headphone have just about everything else.
customer_reviews.author: LL Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but just as important they are very comfortable to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound great but just as important they are very comfortable to wear. Much better than over the ear phones for me.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK STEVENSON

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these. Very comfy headphones, perfect for my large head. Plus, the battery lasts forever. Well, around 16 hours, but a nice length of time. They also hold the bluetooth signal for a good distance in real-world terms. Around 25 feet, through a couple of walls with metal studs. I gagged at the price, frankly, but they are worth the expense. I needed foldable bluetooth headphones, these were the very best.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grow

customer_reviews.title: best pair of headphones from Bose
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my wife... she loves them! They are super light weight. They are super easy to setup through Bluetooth (not like others that take forever to be recognized by your phone, etc). The hold their charge fairly well... I think she used them on and off for about 5 days without charging them... probably about 2-3 hrs a day.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Headphones. I tried Beats no comparison. Bose is the way to go. Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Sound Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are unbelievable! They work flawlessly with all my bluetooth devices. The sound quality is so good that I hear sounds in the music that I have never heard before. I highly recommend them. Before I purchased them, I listened to a demo set of these headphones and a comparable set of beats headphones. I liked the sound quality of the Bose headphones better.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bose SoundLink On-Ear Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how much I enjoy not being enslaved by cords. These headphones connect to all my devices and sound pretty good. I have 3 different models from Bose and they all are fine. These headphones are good for all day use and charge up pretty quickly. They connect to my bluetooth on my Android phone, car bluetooth, home PC, and my work telephone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, cushions are not durable and are expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones , cushions are not durable and are expensive to replace
customer_reviews.author: tariq

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I would say these are the most ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I would say these are the most balanced Bluetooth headphones I have tried. Super comfortable, if not slightly goofy looking how they bend out a bit. I know why they do this, so that they can be more comfortable and don't feel like you have an anvil tightening against your head.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for inside and more stationary use
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and an amazingly long battery life. Wish I could get them to fit more comfortably though as they run the top of my head when active and when shifting the top to around my neck they don't stay on. No real fault of the product itself, just the style of headphones (my other wireless bluetooth headphones are much smaller with just a cable between the ear pieces)
customer_reviews.author: Freeman4ts

customer_reviews.title: Marriager Saver
customer_reviews.text: Saved our marriage! Not quite, but it has quieted (pun intended) the complain of a loud TV with a hard of hearing husband and a wife uninterested in the news. Easy to install on our Samsung TV, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: This head set represents my 3rd Bose "sound investment" in the last couple of years. I have been delighted with all 3, including the Bluetooth headset! Sound is better than I expected for a Bluetooth based device! Good solid base and as with all the Bose devices, midrange sounds are clear and distortion free and highs are crisp and delightful but not harsh and loud! I am very pleased indeed!
customer_reviews.author: kljent

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, comfort and Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A perfect noise canceling headphone for enjoying your music. Awesome sound quality though it does not beat the Beats. Sleek, sexy, comfort and great quality. Connects to the devices easily after turning ON the headphone. They also come with a nice compact carrying case and extra headphone jack plug should you have other devices without Bluetooth.It has an Amazing clear crisp sound with a Long battery life of about 15 hours. It gets even better when the included audio cable is connected. But on the other hand it does have an issue with delay..
customer_reviews.author: Gokul

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, the earpads end up blocking out A LOT ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I purchased these (and returned previously bought over-the-ear wireless headphones) is that these fold up so small that they fit in my jacket pocket. Sound is good, the earpads end up blocking out A LOT of outside noise. Connectivity/pairing is a little wonky...it tries to pair to the last device and if that device isn't found after a few tries it seems to just hang in limbo. And the auto-sleep time is (for me) a bit too short.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best! Being able to take a phone call while using them makes them even better! I recommend these to anyone looking for Bluetooth headphones. The sound is awesome and the way it cancels out background noises is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: great pair and good price.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headphones . Light and easy to run with and does not look like those huge headphones. classic style and stands out and great music. love it
customer_reviews.author: Nimster

customer_reviews.title: Bose delivers again!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones delivers!!! Period. Ear plugs have never sit well with my comfort zone and I decided to give these a try. The only fall back is that they sit on the head which will tend to slip if the head is jerked quickly downward. However, the sound production is exactly what I want to experience with my music.
customer_reviews.author: ROLL TIDE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wireless Headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to compliment a pair of Sony wired headphones. I now use these exclusively. The sound quality is superb! They hold a charge for ever. I have used mine for a week with moderate use and never run out. I did run out once but that was my fault. I switched over to the cord that came with these and the sound is as good as my wired pair. I love these headphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bohmie

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Bought these nearly 3 years ago. Have worked well since then, sound quality has stayed consistent. Bluetooth pairing can be finicky, as it will sometimes hop devices if multiple are within it's range, but overall a very good product. Invest in a hard case, the one it came in did not seem too protective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless function works perfect and the sound quality is Bose
customer_reviews.text: Wireless function works perfect and the sound quality is Bose, as in its very good...but obviously good use a little bit more bass. It is also Bose price...as in expensive...but compared to previous Bose models, there is solid improvement in all aspects..build quality, sound, bluetooth, case...pretty much everything.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, especially if you where eyeglasses. I use them every day for watching movies/TV. The charge seems to last very long, and pairs easily. I would not recommend them for exercise as the ear pads are too absorbent and might wear out prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: Sea View

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WIRED VOLUME, SORTA WIMPY BLUETOOTH VOLUME
customer_reviews.text: WIMPY BLUETOOTH VOLUME BUT POWERFUL VOLUME PLUGGED INTO MY BOSE HEADPHONE ROTARY COMPANION FIVE/5 VOLUME BUTTON/CIRCULAR TAP ON & OFF, ETC., --- BEAUTIFUL STYLE/COLORS
customer_reviews.author: ROCKYMTNMALE

customer_reviews.title: Recommended item, love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter as a Christmas gift and she loves it a lot, we’re very content with this item
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: they still have a very good sound quality as you would expect from BOSE
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these five stars but I would have expected the volume to go higher and also if you wear them for more than 2 hours (which I often do) then they hurt your ears. However, they still have a very good sound quality as you would expect from BOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of the best headphones by far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best headphones by far, Bluetooth was a breeze to sync, sound quality is superb and very comfortable. A current owner of Beats headphone was is good, but if you want to hear more than just bass, true sound quality well, there is no comparison
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all quality is as expected for most listening venues.
customer_reviews.text: I purposed this product for non tethered functionality. Bluetooth sound quality is reasonably good but not nearly as good as when tethered to high end audio equipment. Audio quality improvement is noticeable when bluetooth connects with higher quality cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS LAFOLLETTE

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be like a teenager with large headphones on my head but they are pretty cool and comfortable. Not noise reducing but it does what its suppose to do. There is volume control as do most bose products but very clear and nice to listen with.
customer_reviews.author: Mudds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrific price!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with this purchase. Not only was the recipient of this gift quite pleased, but the seller was very nice to work with! The price went up over the weekend that I was considering this purchase, and this seller was kind enough to honor the original price!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah N

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and I'm so happy that I got these ones for him
customer_reviews.text: When my dog ate my co-workers headphones I felt I had to replace them. He loves them and I'm so happy that I got these ones for him. He says they were better than his original BOSE headphones
customer_reviews.author: Sierra R. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart with daily use after one year.
customer_reviews.text: FALLING APART AFTER A YEAR! While it's not a bad item, which I'd give a "B" rating to, look at how it's falling apart on both sides after about a yer of moderate use. I will not pay for replacements and am actively seeking what its warranty says. At this price, I expect much better.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Has that perfect Bose sound.
customer_reviews.text: Sound just like how Bose should sound a little pricey but it is Bose. Works good when you are close to the source. Sometimes on a MAC if you have your head turned the wrong way it might have a little static. Other than that these are some good wireless cans.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Primus

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband and he loves them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. He especially loves the fact that he can converse on the phone while wearing them and there is no background noise or interference. These are light weight and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Karentall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: These exceed my expectations, which were pretty high, considering it is Bose. Comfortable, excellent sound, long battery life, solid build, easy to connect, and I love being uncorded. Bose might someday have a version that is much slimmer and lighter, but by then I expect I will have had years of good use of them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these are light and comfortable. It makes it much easier to watch movies or listen to music for an extended period. Really easy to pair with any tablet or phone. Plus I like the fact that she (computerized voice when you turn it on) tells me how much battery life it has and what tablet / phone, it's paired to.
customer_reviews.author: [chuckles]

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, convenient, and well built. Good neutral sound quality. Pairs consistently with iPhone 5 and iPad Air 2. Voice tells you what device it is paired to. Controls on headset are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: WHCat

customer_reviews.title: Love! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love! Great quality, small enough to pack and take with me anywhere but big enough to provide great sound and noise canceling. Best wireless headphones on the market, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nolan

customer_reviews.title: These are truly amazing. They are so easy to sync and the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are truly amazing. They are so easy to sync and the sound quality is perfect! They are small also. I've been using the over-ear Bose headphones for years but I can't handle the cord getting caught on everything around me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while before posting to see how they held up while being used when running . Great for music and links to my bluetooth devices very quickly. while training I have exposed the Bose to damp or wet conditions since perspire so heavily, no problems yet. Good usage time after recharge. I highly recommend these headphones. Also they are great for use on cell phone if there is not a lot of background noises.
customer_reviews.author: E. Britt Bell

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent product from Bose
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Bose earbuds in the past, but after several years of use the wires broke. I decided to spend the extra money and go with wireless. No more wires to deal with and great Bose sound. These were a great purchase for a recent plane trip to Colorado and no wires to mess with in a confined space.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E.

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink On-Ear Bluetooth Wireless Headphones - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingCut the cord and set your music free with Bose SoundLink on-ear wireless headphones. The sound is powerful and clear, you can switch easily between music and calls with intuitive controls, and play for hours with a long-lasting rechargeable battery. They're 40% lighter than comparable headphones for a comfortable fit. So it's easier than ever for you to unplug and unwind. Enjoy detailed and balanced sound that raises the bar for Bluetooth headphones. Bose TriPort technology works with Active EQ to deliver music as dynamic as their best wired headphones. You'll hear the deepest lows to the clearest highs, without a wire in sight. With up to 15 hours of play time, you can listen to your favorite music, watch a movie, check out videos and still have plenty of power left. Get a full charge in just 1.5 hours by plugging the included USB cable into any mobile device with a powered port or wall charger. If the battery runs down, a quick 15-minute charge gives you another 2 hours. The adjustable headband rests gently on your head, and earcups rotate for a personalized fit. Soft cushions cradle your ears, and all materials are lightweight and built to last. The earcups fold up to store in the compact carrying case. And there's an extra cable, so you can plug in and listen if the battery runs out. If you get a call while you're listening to music or watching a video, just touch a button on the right earcup and you're instantly connected. Touch again to play, pause, skip and make calls. Roam up to 30 feet while connected to your smartphone and tablet at the same time. Voice prompts tell you battery life, connection status and who's calling. Your phone conversations are clear with SoundLink on-ear headphones-even if you're on a noisy or windy city street. Dual microphones reduce background noise to make sure your voice is heard. And you'll hear your caller's voice clearly, because Bose technologies automatically adjust your headphones' volume as the noise around you changes.
feature_bullets: Crisp powerful sound from the best sounding wireless headphone in its class.Connectivity Technology:Wired/Wireless
Advanced microphone system for clear calls in windy or noisy environments
Up to 15 hours of playtime with rechargeable lithium-ion battery
Easy to use with state of the art interface, including voice prompts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,629 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
